name: 2112: The Battle for Planet Earth
overview: in the year 2112, a meteor swarm crosses the earths orbit, automated defense systems have been constructed long before, but their aiming systems have been damaged by meteoric dust. A repairman on duty must take control of the various laser batteries orbiting the planet ... you! Aim well ... miss once, and a major city will be WIPED OUT and the game will end. One player, one chance, one life! Are you up to it?
